channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10490] HBase Snapshot IF fails at run time with missing dependency of MetricsRegistry
item.summary: HBase Snapshot IF fails at run time with missing dependency of MetricsRegistry

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

sushanth ok for backport for 1.2 ?
Approved for 1.2, I've added this to https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+1.2+Release+Status
This issue has been fixed and released as part of the 1.2.0 release. If you find an issue which seems to be related to this one, please create a new jira and link this one with new jira.
